problem: 如图,AB是⊙O的直径,BC与⊙O相切于点B,点D是⊙O上一点,连接AD交BC于点C,连接OD．若∠C=50°,则∠BOD等于()
answer: 解:∵AB是⊙O的直径,BC与⊙O相切于点B,∴∠ABC=90°,∴∠A=90°-∠C=40°,由圆周角定理得,∠BOD=2∠A=80°,故选:D．
comment: 本题考查的是切线的性质、圆周角定理,掌握圆的切线垂直于经过切点的半径是解题的关键．
problem_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, BC and ⊙O are tangent to point B, point D is a point on ⊙O. Connect AD to BC at point C and connect OD. If ∠C = N_0, then ∠BOD is equal to ()
